mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dr_customer (customer_group_id, store_id, language_id, customer_name, firstname, lastname, email, telephone, password, ip, status, approved, safe, date_added, join_path_id, join_path_etc, myhomedoc) VALUES ( #{customer_group_id}, #{store_id}, #{language_id}, #{customer_name}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{email}, #{telephone}, #{password}, #{ip}, #{status}, #{approved}, #{safe}, NOW(), #{join_path_id}, #{join_path_etc}, #{myhomedoc} )
mapper.select: SELECT cgd.customer_group_id, cgd.name, cgd.reward FROM dr_customer_group_description cgd LEFT JOIN dr_customer_group_reward cgr ON cgd.customer_group_id = cgr.customer_group_id WHERE cgr.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dr_customer_login (customer_id, ip, date_added) VALUES ( #{customer_id}, #{ip}, NOW() )
